arbitrary.sessionDescription:
Brands are not artifacts or representations. They live in our hearts and minds as consistent emotional responses shared across people. In this talk, renowned industrial designer Robert Brunner, Founder and Creative Director of Ammunition, explains how emotions are the high-level currency of brands, and how the best products establish relationships with people and shrink the gap between companies and their constituents. Ultimately, the design of the things you make can build a charismatic brand.

On this brand journey, you'll discover:

  • How to communicate what your brand is about through design
  • Using design to create a relationship with your customer that matters
  • Why some brands become iconic and linked to moments in our lives

cardData.headline: How the Things You Make Shape Brand Connection With Your Audience

description: Join industrial designer to discover how the best products establish relationships & why the design of the things you make can build a charismatic brand
title: How the Things You Make Shape Brand Connection With Your Audience

thumbnail.altText: How the Things You Make Shape Brand Connection With Your Audience

cardData.headline: Building Tomorrow: Digital Art as a Cultural Force

description: Join 3D digital artist Serwah Attafuah to learn how digital creations can evolve into physical experiences, cultural commentary, and tools for social change.
title: Building Tomorrow: Digital Art as a Cultural Force

thumbnail.altText: Building Tomorrow: Digital Art as a Cultural Force

cardData.headline: Design the Logo. Sell the Logo. Chase the Dream.

description: Join renowned logo designer, Allan Peters, as he reveals his unique logo design process and secrets to great client relationships.
title: Design the Logo. Sell the Logo. Chase the Dream.

thumbnail.altText: Design the Logo. Sell the Logo. Chase the Dream.
